## Image\_2.simple() method

Describes an image as a file, by URL.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static simple(url: string): ImageView;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | URL of the source image file. |

**Returns:**

[ImageView](./bge-core.imageview.md)

Display information used when drawing an image.
